website_summaries.verdict: For those seeking the authentic Japanese bento box experience, this classic model is ideal. Insulated bag, stainless steel lunch jar and stackable food bowls make it a better choice than traditional lunch boxes.
pros: Insulated carrying bag is stain- and tear-resistant
Containers are microwave-safe, and the lunch jar has a nonstick lining for easy cleaning
cons: Some components may be plastic, not stainless steel
Containers are not spill- or leak-proof
Foods do not always stay warm in thermos

customer_reviews.title: Product causes cancer and reproductive harm!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is a huge label on the box that says causes cancer and reproductive harm! There should be an equally large warning in the description. It should be in the title! Nobody would intentionally buy cancer. Nobody should intentionally sale it!
customer_reviews.author: Destro

customer_reviews.title: Keep food very hot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has no access to a microwave during lunch time. We packed his lunch at about 7:30am and by 1pm, the food was still very hot. I followed the instructions by preheating the jar with some hot water and microwave the inner bowls with food before putting them in the jar. I highly recommend this product. It is pricey but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: US Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my husband’s lunch. He went ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband’s lunch. He went out from home early in the morning and by lunch time, he told me it is still piping hot! I always trust Zojirushi:) FYI, I initially purchased Ms Bento Zojirushi, but it is too small portion. So, this classic one is really the right size for guys. I hope in the future, Zojirushi considered to manufacture stainlees steel containers instead of BPA free plastics.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Polili Lie

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't someone think of this before?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for taking my wife hot meals in hospital. It keeps food hot for some time. She really enjoyed it. It made her happy to get a hot meal.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was highly disappointed with this item. I trusted Zojirushi because I have bought 2 coffee thermos with them before and they lived up to their product mission. I was hoping that this bento box would do the same but it did not. The food was cold after 3 hours, and my soup leaked every time I used it. Maybe I just got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This is so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I was about to start a very intensive course. The school only provided the students with a vending machine, and since I was gonna be there 12 hours a day every day, I couldn't just buy lunch. NYC is pretty expensive. This not only kept the food warm until lunch break, but it's incredibly easy to clean, carry and the best: it saved me a lot of time and money. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunches!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my bfs lunch so he could stop eating out. There are 3 different contains inside and also a spork. The food doesn't stay super hot, but is still nice and warm when lunchtime comes around. Have not tried using it in the winter which might be a problem because the container stays in the car and it might get cold. But for now this has been working perfectly. We heat up the food in the morning and then put it in the containers. No access to a microwave so it gets eaten at whatever temp it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a loyal fan of Thermos but thought I will give Zojirushi a try when I was looking for similar vacuum jar for my husband. I wanted a thermal jar because I wanted warm lunch and not keen on microwaving. I pack lunch at 7.30am and food is still warm at 1.30pm, so am pretty pleased with that. The bag is very practical and easy to carry. My husband has been getting compliments on his new cool food jar from colleagues too.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking and it works
customer_reviews.text: This is the first vacuum flask I bought with such a high standard where quality is concerned, the material is great and it actually keeps the food warm for 6 hours as advertised. I purchased it for my husband who is in the construction industry and he is quite happy as he opens his container at lunch time to find his food is quite warm. His lunch is packed between 6:15 and 6:30 am each morning and he has lunch at 12 noon. I plan to get the Lady Bento for myself so that I would have no need to be microwaving my food everyday at work which I hate doing. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. R

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Cook breakfast and lunch in the morning, still hot in the early afternoon. There's even enough space between the lid and the top of the bag to throw in a snack, like an apple or some chips. The bottom bowl must be filled with soup, water or some sort of liquid at the temperature at which you wanna keep your food (hot soup/water for hot food, cold for cold food). But beans or a thick sauce will do too.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Not hot.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nothing but glorified ziplock container. Nothing stays hot and its a little too small or adult lunch...its maybe a elementary kids lunch size...
customer_reviews.author: Soosoo

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my lunch cool or warm, just as promised. Prime the main container with ice water or hot water before packing. Good quality and great compact design, once you get used to the shape and sizing of the individual portions. Three containers works out well for variety and a balanced meal, and the carry strap and bag are convenient and look great. Utensils are a higher quality than I was expecting, and the soup container, which I use for any liquid or sauce, does not leak. Very happy with Zojirushi Bento.
customer_reviews.author: jc vt

customer_reviews.title: Saving time and money
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money. I work at night so it's hard to do lunch. Most of the places around me close by the time I take lunch and even if I do go out it costs a lot of money but the end of the week. This was a big relief to my wallet. Now I just cook before I go to work and by the time I take lunch 4-5 hours later the food is still hot. Not piping hot but still steaming. A good enough temperature to eat. The bowls are convenient sized and easy to carry and to clean. A pretty good investment
customer_reviews.author: Kevin leong

customer_reviews.title: Zojirushi makes some really great things. I can pack hot soup in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Zojirushi makes some really great things. I can pack hot soup in this at night, and it will still be warm at lunch the next day. The inside containers do leak a little, but nothing escapes from the larger container.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep portions small if on a diet
customer_reviews.text: Good lunch jar, food was still a little warm after about 5 hours sitting outside the work truck in cold weather. Portion size is good especially if you are in a diet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right size, great color, and awesome construction
customer_reviews.text: I initially couldn't get past the price, but my wife insisted. Turns out she was right. This is an awesome 'lunch box' with everything being just the right size. The color is great, and the quality is amazing. The only nit I have, and it's a small one ... the bigger container isn't perfectly spill spoof, so if the bento goes on its side, there will be a little cleaning to do on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde R. Lowry Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works really well if you use each container for its purpose. Recommended if you don't have access to a microwave or don't want to wait for it.
customer_reviews.author: Bestnameever

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter.
customer_reviews.text: Best lunch box for last 15 years. If I didn’t drop on the asphalt (made a dent) I will be using same lunch box many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hot meal when it’s snowing in winter. It’s a relatively small lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He told me that he didn't pre-heat, put hot food in the containers and it was still warm-eating temperature 6+ hours later. Exactly what he wanted, and I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good quality. keep hot at least 6 hour for me
customer_reviews.author: Travis G

customer_reviews.title: Not a great quality for plastic
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set for asian food with rice and side dishes. It has been leaking. The reason why I gave 2 stars is because it's still a little warm after a short period of time. Otherwise, a 1 star would be given.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for school and it works great. I would have liked all 3 containers to be able to hold heat but it is still an amazing product. Easy to clean and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the soup bowl was bigger. The side bowl is about right for most sides. The large bowl with twist-lock lid is pretty decent sized. The spork fits in the outer insulating jacket. The chopstick holder slides into a slot on the main container. The knob on the soup bowl is vital for removing it from the main container. It's a good idea not to microwave the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It looks big outside but does not fit too much food. The quality of product is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Great bento box!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bento box! It is convenient for students. However, it is still a little heavy and I really prefer light items. It is easy to clean. I look through the website to find one suitable lunch box, and it is almost the perfect one satisfying most of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy ZHOU

customer_reviews.title: nice hot lunch
customer_reviews.text: Need to follow instruction... boil hot water and pre-heat it first before putting lunch in it...
customer_reviews.author: D. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very compact and food stay warm until I have my lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great bento!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bento quite a while now and I really like it. I put soup in the bottom bowl, usually come crackers in the middle and some other snack in the top. It keeps my soup hot for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Norlen

customer_reviews.title: I love It. it has been few months now but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love It. it has been few months now but so far so good. except the bag is too small to put additional snacks but it I am rating regarding the product it self. Even at the end of the day, the leftovers are still warm! My kids enjoy eating warm (hot) lunch during cold days.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ryou

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lunch jar that keep food hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lunch jar that keep food hot for hours. I like how it even comes with fork and chopsticks, the jar has a carry strap that's very practical. I followed another customer's review comments, and replaced the bottom bowl with a one-cup pyrex, and top bowl with a 2 cup pyrex with the blue lid, soup bowl fit in the middle. Now I've got two dishwashable glass bowls, Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jzmaverick

customer_reviews.title: Best "Lunch Box" Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I completely am in love with this "lunch box". It keeps the food warm or cool extremely well and also keeps the food separated. The chopsticks are not the best quality, but the spork does a good job getting the food to your mouth! I always receive compliments at the work microwave on the design!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nederhoed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enough and proper sizes for one person. Outstanding capacity to keep the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Kim, Tea-Woo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got more that what I was expecting for. It keeps the temperature for a long time. It has an elegant view and the amount of food you can put inside the containers is good enough to feel you are not hungry anymore and that will help you to keep you the same weight.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Gomez Angulo

customer_reviews.title: This container it’s amazing because keep my food 🥙🥗🥘🌯🍕worm ♨️in the winter for ...
customer_reviews.text: This container it’s amazing because keep my food 🥙🥗🥘🌯🍕worm ♨️in the winter for 7-8 hours😱😱, keep fresh and nice, I’m lives in Maryland and recommended this item 👌🏼💯
customer_reviews.author: Germain José angel muñoz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Stays warm and easy to clean. Love the bag with the spork and chop sticks.
customer_reviews.author: vero

customer_reviews.title: great idea but that's it
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't do what the reviews say. Six hours? I submerged it for an hour in very hot water and heated up the food and only got a couple of hours out of it and even then it was only luke warm.
customer_reviews.author: rklaass

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good, but have to thoroughly clean so that there's no remnant food smell. The containers have a really good size where you can put a lot of food.
customer_reviews.author: Nassuel Valera

customer_reviews.title: Good but leak
customer_reviews.text: Zojirushi has the best made quality in the market, this one proves it, but the middle and the top bins leaks, they should make all bins leak-proof.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bento...I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It keeps food hot or cold...or whatever you want it to me. I frequently will throw the bottom container in the microwave before I leave for the day, pack my lunch in the bento, and by lunch time all my food is warm. I haven't found anything better and wouldn't trade this for anything.
customer_reviews.author: m.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Great product and really does work. Finally get to take. Warm food to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The foods that seem to do best in it is pasta
customer_reviews.text: Got this lunchbox about for my daughter who is always complaining about having the same thing every day in her lunchbox. It keeps warm until lunchtime even when I pack a lunch around 7 AM. The foods that seem to do best in it is pasta.
customer_reviews.author: BlueberryPie

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I expected. Keeps my food nice and warm. When you have your lunch it feels as if you just heated it up and served it. The bowl sizes are great for me. If they seem small to you then buy the bigger one. Super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. keeps food warm just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great .keeps food warm just as advertised. Love it when a product does what it says
customer_reviews.author: James Barton

customer_reviews.title: Spot on.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who works underground and has limited options for a hot meal. He loves this setup. The food stays warm for up to 6 or 7 hours, and provides ample space for a good sized lunch or dinner. He follows the instructions regarding warming the containers and outer shell before filling and is delighted with the result. Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: A Very Cool Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: The lunchbox is a cool way to take your lunch to school/work or whatever. It keeps things separate and fits nicely with proportions. Its also very easy to clean and keeps things hot or cold for awhile. The only reason I took off a star is because I wish the strap was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: clever
customer_reviews.text: An excellent way to have a hot lunch, holds more than you think. And doesn't take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Laura  Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a surprisingly large capacity for food. Keeps lunches and dinners hot.
customer_reviews.author: Monograph

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband,absolutely recommended for packed lunch. His lunch stays hot and retains flavour
customer_reviews.author: Amondi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for commuters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a commuting student. Everything is compacted into one bag make it easier to carry around public transit. The rice was hot until lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful alternative to brown-bagging it.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, nicely assembled, and attractive bento set. Great size, with ample room for food. Keeps food at a fine temperature until about lunch time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: My review.
customer_reviews.text: This bento lunch jar is easy to carry and it comes with spork and chopstick and carry bag. Also even you put the jar in the fridge the food inside still warm. Happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I would have give this a perfect "5" if it had additional room for a small bottle of water. Nice touch adding both a set of chopsticks & silverware.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Bento Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The price kept me away for many months but I finally took the plunge. No regrets. The Zojirushi rig is great. The Classic Bento has made it very easy for me to control portions but still take plenty of healthy food to work. The food keeps well chilled or hot depending on the food of the day and had not let me down at all. Much better than dealing with the communal fridge and frightful microwave at the office. My food is well protected and easy to access. No more baggies and trash to recycle. No more smashed and bruised fruit or veg. The pieces are very easy to clean and just work wonderfully. Love it! ~m
customer_reviews.author: AppleCedAR

customer_reviews.title: Love that it came with both the spoon/fork and chopsticks
customer_reviews.text: Love that it came with both the spoon/fork and chopsticks!! Good for keeping food warm for almost 8 hours. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used every day to take my lunch to work and it is very useful and easy to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Holds more than enough food
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Holds more than enough food. Keeps what you want hot for hours. My daughter was eating pot roast and potatoes at school instead of......well I have seen it but didn't know what it was, school food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what I paid
customer_reviews.text: Product is small but well organized. However, it doesn’t hold the heat well and most importantly, the soup cup is leaking badly and my lunch was ruined
customer_reviews.author: You&J

customer_reviews.title: don't buy leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: always leaks, food doesn't stay even close to warm. worse buy ever!!! LEAK PROOF: -5/5
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've never been dissatisfied with a Zojirushi product and this bento box continues that pattern. Works as claimed and the manufacturing quality is obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Alan V

customer_reviews.title: Great with temperature, limits flexibility
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does better than I expected at keeping my lunches cold. There have been days where I didn't get to eat something but it would still be cool ten hours later when I got home. I haven't tried to keep anything warm yet. The only thing that I don't like, and I guess I should've seen coming, was that it very much limits the types of food you can take. Soups, small snacks and things of that nature are great. But if you have a sandwich or a yogurt snack for later or something there's not really any where to put it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Kept my food warm enough for 6 1/2 hours, I was skeptical ...Just fallowed the recommendations on warming up the container with hot water and worked fine..
customer_reviews.author: Jose G. Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: I got this lunch jar for my daughter to take with her to university and have a snack between lectures. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space, a little bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Huge amount of space. Can't imagine anyone needs to pack more for a single lunch. I got this for my special needs teen who has a specific diet. He's got a huge appetite and he's usually *still* full when he gets home from school. The bag/straps are a little unwieldy, especially as my son's motor skills aren't great, but they're manageable. The picture doesn't show it, but the jar has a strap attached. You put the jar in the bag, then close the velcro over the straps. Would have been easier to just have the strap on the bag, but that's just not enough of a negative to take off a full star. Very well thought out lunch kit!
customer_reviews.author: Misty L. Benefield

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about 3 months now, it keeps food warm/cold for more than 6/7 hours. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah M

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have been using it for work.
customer_reviews.author: marcus a smith

customer_reviews.title: Unlike ALL the other reviews, this does NOT keep things hot.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike ALL the other reviews, this does NOT keep things hot. I microwave soup and keep it in the bottom bowl, which is the insulated bowl for soup. When I get to lunch, 4-5 hours later, the soup is tepid. Not hot at all. There is NO WAY you would think the soup is hot. So I don't understand why other say it is piping hot at lunch. No way. But, this is a very handy way to take your lunch, and I use this most days. Just don't think anything hot in the morning will be hot by lunch.
customer_reviews.author: WooPigFoodie

customer_reviews.title: Product came used
customer_reviews.text: Am not one to usually write reviews but this was just dissapointing to me. Product is used and the containers smell like food. The product has water marks on it and they are also dirty (food crumbs). The bag has white mark stains as well. Very disappointed that I received a used product. I will be returning this product back and hopefully receive something new like I had purchased. Pictures are below.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A little on the smaller side, but the quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Ama Addai

customer_reviews.title: keeps the food hot
customer_reviews.text: keeps the food hot even when a microwave is not available. my co workers bought some too. we work in construction. its my ninja lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: mg1sa

customer_reviews.title: Great product. If you're looking to eat healthy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. If you're looking to eat healthy, save money, and cook more at home. Owning this lunch jar is a step in that direction. Also very well made and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: NEBI LIKA

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: this has a good size to take food in and stays hot until lunch
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: At first i thought the containers were too small and i wasn't gonna be able to take a lot of food, but i was wrong!!! Don't let the images fool!
customer_reviews.author: Bike4Life

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: The lunch jar makes my husband's work days much easier!! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: A_L

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my 8-year-old. He has trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 8-year-old. He has trouble opening the cap for one of the containers (the middle sized). Also, I think the cover bag will be easier for a little kid to handle if it's designed as a simple zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great solution for a civilized lunch
customer_reviews.text: Great, great invention. Keeps food hot, warm and cool (depending on the tier inside the container). Others will complain about the other two containers not being appropriate for liquids - that's like complaining that a fork makes for a crummy spoon. Bottom is for liquids, middle for rice, top for loose veggies or similar. And it works spectacularly. "Hannibal-esque" levels of quality.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: No more fast food at lunch
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because my place of work did not have a kitchen or microwave. I didn't want to spend money on fast food or eat cold lunches everyday. This kept my food hot and/or cold. I would pack soup, mac and cheese, chicken, beef, beans, rice, pasta, Fresh fruit, sandwiches, salad and lots more. Make sure to read the do's and don't with this product. DO NOT microwave the lids! DO enjoy you food within 6 hours of packing. Great for picnics, fishing trips, biking, hiking and other outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: J. Regalado

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it to take his lunch to school. Best product ever. Food stays hot!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Green

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food warm
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food warm and includes everything needed for breakfast lunch or dinner. Follow the instructions for heating package before you seal because it will greatly effect the temperature when you're ready to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product with high quality. The bag is a nice feature, and the heat insulation keeps the lunch warm for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Noushin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love This!!! Wish it would stay hotter longer, but I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food spills, does not stay hot!
customer_reviews.text: The food spilled all over the place. It does not stay hot. The containers are very small. The whole thing is difficult to assemble. What else do you need to know? I was very disappointed and in the end I really can't find any use for the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Patitolucas

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its promise
customer_reviews.text: Keeps its promise. Keeps your food warm. Good for an all day kind of work or in my case for my daughter who prefers to eat warm lunch. Worth every penny. The bag though could use a stronger material but otherwise i am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kayeren

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed using Classic Bento
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using Classic Bento. This food carry system is very useful because I can have hot and not so hot or even cool foods with me. I like the transportability of this bento. Thanks for mKing. Vhatlrd Hrnry
customer_reviews.author: charles henry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Lunch Box~ Keep my rice warmed til lunch time!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: The best lunchbox for rice meal
customer_reviews.text: It's a classic. Lightweigt and keep worm until lunchtime. I think it's the best for rice meal I'm delighted. The bottom container suppose to fill hoy soup.
customer_reviews.author: hyunsun hong

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat old school design!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I had the older version of these containers. And although they were slit more clumsy and fragile(glass thermos lined). They were slit better. Can't beat old school!!!
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: Great Bento
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bento! It's great and easy to carry. Food really does stay piping hot! The only qualm I have is I wish the middle container, which is also the biggest one, was also spill-proof. I like bringing soup for lunch and a whole bowl of soup fits in the middle container but I open the vacuum container up at lunch to find that it's leaked everywhere. The soup container (bottom) is really way to small. I think it's meant for a small serving of miso or broth. Not really for a stew or anything hearty.
customer_reviews.author: JCK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. The delivery was very prompt. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Inessa Khavasova

customer_reviews.title: Keeps lunch warm for 4-5 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of scratches on the outer box. I suppose it was a display product. But it works. I can eat hot meat at lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Yeliz Ozel

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps food really hot for hours, but the soup box is really too small.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Carlino

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. It was a gift that would be very difficult to find in the area in which I live.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this product but I can never get it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but I can never get it to keep the soup hot. Very disappointing. The tumbler thermos works very well, I was hoping for the same level of function.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Now I love to pack and carry my food for lunch. The lunch jar looks trendy, many colleagues have complimented while I was opening the jar and taking out the boxes inside it. Food remains warm as described. I make sure to clean the boxes right after eating to avoid any smell later. This lunch jar has three boxes, so sometimes I feel I should have purchased a bigger one with four boxes. But the cover bag is big and has additional space to add a small box if needed. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: It's oookay
customer_reviews.text: The option seemed too good to be true, keeps food hot or cold for hours at a time. Kinda. Food after about 5 hours is room temp and the containers are awfully small to food other than rice and some salad dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'de buy it every day of the week and twice on Sunday
customer_reviews.author: Veritas

customer_reviews.title: Great item but..
customer_reviews.text: doesn't store much and only one container is leak proof... wish all 3 were leak proof... heavy and bulky. bought it for my husband but he stopped using it after a couple weeks. oh well.
customer_reviews.author: eunice

customer_reviews.title: Lunch box review
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who is picky about his lunch, Hot things stay semi-hot until his lunch time. I microwave meals at 8 he eats at 12. He says they are "warm".. his biggest complaint is the condensation. probably not a biggie for adults, but for a 10 year old who is food picky, may be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Sounded like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Really expensive, and it's too much of a pain to wash each of these containers (not dishwasher safe) every freaking day. Sounded like a good idea, I use a simple tupperware container now.
customer_reviews.author: buyguy

customer_reviews.title: it's warm at best around lunch time
customer_reviews.text: This is decent product, but it does keep the food hot. Even with pre-conditioning, it's warm at best around lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Will0711

product_meta.title: Zojirushi Classic Bento Vacuum Lunch Jar -
product_meta.description: Zojirushi's Classic Bento Stainless Lunch Jar in Ultra Black provides an excellent way to safely and conveniently pack lunch where a microwave or a refrigerator may not be available. You will also appreciate the "greenness" of packing a lunch in our jars, instead of using a paper bag or disposable container. Heat Retention After 6 Hours*:156°F Cold Retention After 6 Hours**:50°F *Rating is based on water at a starting temperature of 203°F (95°C) at a room temperature of 68°F (20°C) **Rating is based on water at a starting temperature of 40°F (4°C) at a room temperature of 68°F (20°C)
feature_bullets: A convenient, efficient way to keep foods hot or cold longer when transporting to places without microwaves or refrigerators
Made from stainless steel with vacuum insulation; durable and will stand up to daily use
Equipped with 3 lidded inner containers; offers ample storage for food; includes a forked spoon and a convenient carrying bag
Each of the 3 containers is microwave safe, but lids are best left out of microwaves; Dimensions (W x D x H): 6 x 5.37 x 8.37 inches
A nonstick coated washable inner container makes it easy to keep the lunch jar clean
